<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Coordination](/Feats.aspx?ID=4597) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[warrior muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=4); [Rallying Anthem](/Feats.aspx?ID=4592)

</column>

---

Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line. If your next action is to cast the [_rallying anthem_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1773) composition cantrip, you can [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=2316), and one ally of your choice who gains a status bonus from the spell can immediately use their reaction to Raise a Shield.
name: Defensive Coordination
